metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4378 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: A stack overflow flaw was found in the Linux kernel's SYSCTL subsystem inhow a user changes certain kernel parameters and variables. This flawallows a local user to crash or potentially escalate their privileges onthe system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
